verbose_text: On one hand, the effects of histamine, bradykinin and leukotriene cause the contraction of vascular ECs; on the other hand, the release of a series of myocardial depressant substances, including TNF-alpha and IL-6, may cause the remodeling of the EC skeleton.
evidence: histamine, bradykinin and leukotriene cause the contraction of vascular ECs
